items.text: tossed up slower and higher on middle, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: lobbed up on middle and turns in, dragged out to deep square leg off the inside half of the bat
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: Tamim presses forward to defend this full ball on a fourth-stump line
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: biting legbreak, Tamim has a short stride, the ball grazes the inside edge and rolls square on the leg side
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed on middle, eased down to long-on. Jogged single
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, Cremer cops punishment. He nimbly skips back and square-cuts it away to the left of backward point
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: worked wide of short fine leg for a single
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: drifting down leg, past the attempted sweep of Shakib
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: drifts in at off and breaks past the outside edge as Shakib has a loose prod at it
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tapped down to wide long-on off the front foot this time
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full and sliding away outside off, driven off the front foot to wide long-off. An overthrow hands Bangladesh two more runs
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 3 runs

items.text: tickled to short fine leg coming in
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: arm ball, Shakib hangs back and keeps it out on middle stump
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fractionally short and wide outside off, cut to backward point
items.postText: Thats drinks, and over to Sreshth for another spell
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: We're back after drinks. Bangladesh need a further 69 runs. They have 32 overs to do it.
items.text: full on off stump, spins into the left-hander, defended away towards the leg side
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: not afraid to flight it up, full outside off, down on one knee and tries to sweep, but misses as he loses his balance. Struck him outside off
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and zipping straight through to the keeper. Close, just past the outside edge of Tamim's attempted defense
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, spinning down the leg side, misses the attempted pull. They appeal for the caught behind, but not given
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: once again full on leg stump, misses the flick off his pads and the ball goes down the leg side. Sharply taken by the keeper. Soft appeal for caught behind, and it's given! Tamim reviews. Absolutely no touch from the bat there. The decision has been overturned. But the umpire isn't declaring it a wide, now. Ok, now he does. Awkward all around.
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: full outside off stump, steps forward and tries to sweep, misses the shot, but they don't want the leg bye
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, spinning away from Tamim as he pokes at it, cut late past short third man, and it beats the infielder. A boundary off the over's extra ball
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full on leg stump, can't tap this away to square leg. Hits his pad outside leg stump
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: 19.1 full on off stump, steps forward and attempts a defense, misses the shot. Big appeal from Raza for the lbw, but not out, says the umpire. Raza asks Cremer to review. Pitched full on off stump, drifts into his pads, no contact with the bat. Impact in line, and would've gone on to crash into leg stump. The umpire overturns his decision.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan lbw b Sikandar Raza 37 (46b 5x4 0x6) SR: 80.43

items.preText: Two cracking review decisions from both sides. It's not a compliment to either umpire, though.
items.text: tossed up on off stump, turned off his toes to square leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Abdul Halim: "Interesting fact, SL and ZIM coach was a part of Bangladesh cricket in recent time. If bangladesh win the tournament, they will beat their ex coaching staff too."
items.text: flighted full on off stump, cramped for room on this occasion, dug away to cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
